Group.name: CanSat
Group.description: CanSat is a miniature satellite in a can-sized package, offering hands-on learning in aerospace engineering and space science. With sensors and communication systems, it conducts scientific experiments during a controlled descent from high altitudes. This educational tool inspires students and enthusiasts alike to explore the realms of space technology and fosters practical skills and knowledge in a challenging and rewarding way.

Solo.name: TopeBot
Solo.description: A Discord bot powered by Discord.js is a dynamic AI companion for Discord servers. Utilizing the Discord API, this bot can be customized to perform various tasks, from moderating and playing music to providing real-time information. With flexibility and functionality at its core, Discord.js bots enhance Discord communities with ease and excitement.
